item.title: Apple and Google detail COVID-19 contact tracing program, focus on privacy [u]
item.description: Apple and Google have built the system from the ground up to respect strong privacy policies. No location data or personally identifiable information is collected as part of the system, and each device’s Bluetooth identifier will change periodically to prevent unwanted tracking. Read on appleinsider.com
